title: I bubbled the question OMR on one side, but not the other. Will they consider the other side for evaluation?
content: Stupid question I know, but for a particular question today I marked the bubble on one side and forgot to on the other. Will they scan both the front and back of the page? Or only the front side where I've bubbled?

comments.body: Afaik , the answer will be considered till wherever the next question's  bubble starts
ah so suppose i marked question 2 on one side, and continued it to the next page but didn't mark it there, the entire thing will still be evaluated?
Yup, until you bubble next question, the previous one will be considered
Thank you! I was stressing over this because the question in hand was a 4 marker and I'm already losing a lot of marks lmao
I made the same mistake fml, Did you get your marks? ðŸ¥¹
